properties.name: First Ladies & Cherry Trees Information
properties.notes: In view of the White House, this informational sign discusses the roles of First Ladies in connection with the cherry blossoms.

properties.name: First Lady Tree and the Science Behind the Trees
properties.notes: Informational sign discusses how cherry trees are cultivated, including a unique First Lady cherry tree at this location.

properties.name: National Cherry Blossom Festival - the Organization
properties.notes: Informational sign discusses the history of the cherry blossom festival.

properties.name: National Cherry Blossom Festival - the Event
properties.notes: Informational sign discusses the history of the cherry blossom festival.

properties.name: Predicting Peak Bloom
properties.notes: Informational sign that talks about the science of forecasting when the trees will bloom.
